name: Bubble Shooter! Extreme
description:
Play and enjoy Bubble Shooter! Extreme, the classic game that takes bubble shooting to another level of fun and entertainment. Download today for free and enjoy thousands of extreme puzzles and challenges. Think you up for the challenge? Start playing today!

Get ready for a new bubble popping game. Hit, Pop and Smash all the bubbles by matching 3 colors, win coins and solve all the fun brain teasers.
Try out this exciting bubble shooter game, aim carefully to hit the target and explode all the colorful balloons! Don’t miss out this crazy bubble pop adventure, compete against friends and family and see who can reach the highest score and get three stars on every level. This incredible board game is simple and easy to learn, perfect for both adults and kids to enjoy!
Bubble Shooter! Extreme is the best puzzle matching game with unique gameplay!

Bubble games are much easier when you get some help! Charge up with awesome boosters that will help you blast through the levels. Work your way through some bubble challenges and puzzles, overcome all the obstacles on your way and clear the board! Match 3 balls or more of the same color to pop, win coins and solve the bubble puzzles.
Looking for fun games for adults and games for kids to play and have a blast? Can’t get enough of online board games? Download this awesome bubble extreme game and take your gaming experience to the next level.


AWESOME FEATURES:
- Discover exciting new levels in this awesome bubble shooting arcade game.
- Experience a classic, relaxing bubble puzzle game designed to keep your mind sharp and active.
- Cool boosters and power-ups.
- Looking for fun games for the whole family to enjoy? Bubble Shooter! Extreme is your best choice! Both kids and adults will enjoy this easy and relaxing bubble popper game.
- Fans of classic bubble shooter games will enjoy awesome retro-style graphics and designs.
- Free bubble pop game, easy to pick up and play!


Play now and try to beat thousands of extreme levels. Drag your finger to move the laser sight, and lift it to shoot bubbles. Aim carefully and match at least 3 bubbles of the same color to burst the group and create a line explosion. Shoot and blast all the balloons until you clear the board and move on to the next awesome level. You can swap bubbles without limit, just tap on your bubble to change its color. Form a strategy to clear all the balls and pop your way up to victory!

Unlock and use amazing boosts and power-ups to complete levels and become the great bubble pop master:
* Fireball – pop 7 bubbles in a row to get a fireball that will burn every bubble on the way.
* Bomb – drop 10 balloons or more to earn a bomb that will explode surrounding bubbles.
WARNING! This fun arcade game contains awesome bubbles, boosts, and features and it’s totally addictive! Popping bubbles is the best way to relax and pass the time.
What are you waiting for?
Press PLAY and enjoy this great bubble game!


ULTRA FUN GAME: PLAY & WIN!
- Tap on the screen to drag the laser aim and lift it to take a shot.
- Match 3 colors and shoot all the balls.
- Hit, blast and burst the balloons in this extreme bubble shooter.
- Pop bubbles, finish levels and win coins!
- Shoot bubbles and relive your childhood memories playing fun arcade games.
- Challenge yourself with thousands of exciting puzzle levels.
- Boost your gaming experience with some incredible power-ups that will help you burst bubbles.
- The more bubbles you remove from the board in one shot, the higher score you’ll get.

Are you extreme enough to take up the challenge of Bubble Shooter Extreme?
Try it out today FOR FREE!

Liked the game? We would love to get your feedback! Let us know what we can add to make your gameplay even more enjoyable and earn your 5-star review.

Bubble Shooter! Extreme is free to play, but some optional in-game items will require payment.
